meanings.definition: A person who does not take part in an activity or event.
meanings.sent1: The nonparticipant watched the game from the sidelines.
meanings.sent2: The nonparticipant decided not to join the dance competition.
meanings.sent3: The nonparticipant at the party was content just observing everyone else.
meanings.sent4: Like a shadow, the nonparticipant lingered on the outskirts of the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The nonparticipant's absence was noticeable in the group photo.

meanings.definition: Not participating in an activity or event.
meanings.sent1: The nonparticipant group preferred to stay out of the spotlight.
meanings.sent2: Her nonparticipant attitude towards the project surprised her teammates.
meanings.sent3: The nonparticipant approach to the game led to a unique perspective.
meanings.sent4: The room felt empty with its nonparticipant atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: His nonparticipant behavior stood out among the eager participants.
